title.rendered: iSOUL Lightning iPhone Charger Cable, 6.5ft/2m Short Braided USB Cord for iPhone 12/11/Pro/XS/Max/XR/X/10/8/7/6s Plus…

content.rendered:
Lightning iPhone Charger Data Cable, 6.5ft/2m【Apple MFi Certified】 Nylon Braided USB Cord

Why select the iSOUL Apple-certified lightning cable? Each iSOUL Lightning Cable incorporates an authorization chip issued by Apple to make sure 100% compatibility with any of your lightning gadgets.

Unrivalled Durability Exceptional tensile energy is supplied by a high-performance, ultra-strong aramid fibre core, which is wrapped in a double-braided nylon sheath, leading to a supple but strong cable with superior toughness. The cable is ready to stand up to hundreds as much as 55kg and has been examined to bend 95-degrees greater than 9,000 occasions.

2.4A and CE-certified for sooner and safer charging Made of high-quality tin-plated copper, the cable additionally consists of a particular insulation layer which reduces the chance of a brief circuit between optimistic and damaging terminals. The authentic Apple chip affords most charging speeds, making the product secure and dependable for customers.

Compact and durable head High-quality aluminium plug with a connector defend that has been seamlessly laser welded, giving it the power to resist hundreds as much as 15kg with out incurring harm. The plug stays purposeful even after finishing 10,000 plug-in checks.

Durability and Flexibility: Reinforced with a highly-elastic thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) jacket, the cable is extraordinarily sturdy and tear-resistant, guaranteeing that the seams stay firmly bonded. The woven exterior consists of ultra-strong and versatile but delicate fibres, therefore stopping entanglement and supporting hundreds over 55kg.

Compatible With: iPhone XS / XS Max / X / XR / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 iPad Air / Air 2 / Pro, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4, iPad (4th technology) iPod nano (seventh technology) and iPod contact (fifth / sixth technology)

(*7*)

Each iSOUL Lightning Cable incorporates an authorization chip issued by Apple to make sure 100% compatibility with any of your lightning gadgets.

Apple Ensured Compatibility

MFi stands for “Made for iPhone, iPad, iPod”

The original Apple chip offers maximum charging speeds, making the product safe and reliable for users.

Apple MFi Certified

Compatible With

  • For iPhone XS, For iPhone XS Max, For iPhone X, For iPhone XR
  • For iPhone 8, For iPhone 8 Plus, For iPhone 7, For iPhone 7 Plus, For iPhone 6/6s, For iPhone 6 Plus, For iPhone 6s Plus
  • For iPhone 5, For iPhone 5c, For iPhone 5s, For iPhone SE
  • For iPad Air, For iPad Air 2, For iPad Pro, For iPad Mini, For iPad Mini 2, For iPad Mini 3
  • For iPad (4th generation), For iPod nano (7th generation) and For iPod touch (5th / 6th generation)
